pullRequest.title: New ReadWriteSafeCache. Rewrite the whole Window and Collection. Simplify codes
pullRequest.bodyText:
The old Window and Collection are very hard to read and understand, so I rewrite them to the new ReadWriteSafeCache and BufferedData.
In theory, they are the same in performance and code logic. But the new ReadWriteSafeCache includes more clear lock logic inside, and easier to use.

commit.message: Rewrite the whole window and collection to new ReadWriteSafeCache.
